verses.verse: <S%G3778>These<s%> <S%G3778>things<s%> <S%G2424>Jesus<s%> <S%G2980>spoke;<s%> and <S%G1869>lifting<s%> up His <S%G3788>eyes<s%> to <S%G3772>heaven,<s%> He <S%G3004>said,<s%> <S%G3962>"Father,<s%> the <S%G5610>hour<s%> has <S%G2064>come;<s%> <S%G1392>glorify<s%> Thy <S%G5207>Son,<s%> that the <S%G5207>Son<s%> may <S%G1392>glorify<s%> Thee,

<S%G2531>even<s%> as Thou <S%G1325>gavest<s%> Him <S%G1849>authority<s%> over <S%G3956>all<s%> <S%G4561>mankind,<s%> that to <S%G3956>all<s%> <S%G3739>whom<s%> Thou hast <S%G1325>given<s%> Him, He may <S%G1325>give<s%> <S%G166>eternal<s%> <S%G2222>life.<s%>

"And <S%G3778>this<s%> is <S%G166>eternal<s%> <S%G2222>life,<s%> that they may <S%G1097>know<s%> Thee, the <S%G3441>only<s%> <S%G228>true<s%> <S%G2316>God,<s%> and <S%G2424>Jesus<s%> <S%G5547>Christ<s%> <S%G3739>whom<s%> Thou hast <S%G649>sent.<s%>
"I <S%G1392>glorified<s%> Thee on the <S%G1093>earth,<s%> having <S%G5048>accomplished<s%> the <S%G2041>work<s%> <S%G3739>which<s%> Thou hast <S%G1325>given<s%> Me to <S%G4160>do.<s%>

"And <S%G3568>now,<s%> <S%G1392>glorify<s%> Thou Me <S%G3844>together<s%> with <S%G4572>Thyself,<s%> <S%G3962>Father,<s%> with the <S%G1391>glory<s%> <S%G3739>which<s%> I <S%G2192>had<s%> with Thee <S%G4253>before<s%> the <S%G2889>world<s%> was.

"I <S%G5319>manifested<s%> Thy <S%G3686>name<s%> to the <S%G444>men<s%> <S%G3739>whom<s%> Thou <S%G1325>gavest<s%> Me out of the <S%G2889>world;<s%> <S%G4771>Thine<s%> they were, and Thou <S%G1325>gavest<s%> them to Me, and they have <S%G5083>kept<s%> Thy <S%G3056>word.<s%>
<S%G3568>"Now<s%> they have come to <S%G1097>know<s%> that <S%G3956>everything<s%> Thou hast <S%G1325>given<s%> Me is from Thee;

for the <S%G4487>words<s%> <S%G3739>which<s%> Thou <S%G1325>gavest<s%> Me I have <S%G1325>given<s%> to them; and they <S%G2983>received<s%> [them,] and <S%G230>truly<s%> <S%G1097>understood<s%> that I <S%G1831>came<s%> <S%G1831>forth<s%> from Thee, and they <S%G4100>believed<s%> that Thou didst <S%G649>send<s%> Me.

"I <S%G2065>ask<s%> on their <S%G4012>behalf;<s%> I do not <S%G2065>ask<s%> on <S%G4012>behalf<s%> of the <S%G2889>world,<s%> but of those <S%G3739>whom<s%> Thou hast <S%G1325>given<s%> Me; for they are <S%G4771>Thine;<s%>
and <S%G3956>all<s%> <S%G3956>things<s%> that are <S%G1699>Mine<s%> are <S%G4674>Thine,<s%> and <S%G4674>Thine<s%> are <S%G1699>Mine;<s%> and I have been <S%G1392>glorified<s%> in them.

"And I <S%G1510>am<s%> <S%G3765>no<s%> <S%G3765>more<s%> in the <S%G2889>world;<s%> and [yet] they <S%G846>themselves<s%> are in the <S%G2889>world,<s%> and I <S%G2064>come<s%> to Thee. <S%G40>Holy<s%> <S%G3962>Father,<s%> <S%G5083>keep<s%> them in Thy <S%G3686>name,<s%> [the name] <S%G3739>which<s%> Thou hast <S%G1325>given<s%> Me, that they may be <S%G1520>one,<s%> <S%G2531>even<s%> as We [are.]

<S%G3753>"While<s%> I was with them, I was <S%G5083>keeping<s%> them in Thy <S%G3686>name<s%> <S%G3739>which<s%> Thou hast <S%G1325>given<s%> Me; and I <S%G5442>guarded<s%> them, and not <S%G3762>one<s%> of them <S%G622>perished<s%> but the <S%G5207>son<s%> of <S%G684>perdition,<s%> that the <S%G1124>Scripture<s%> might be <S%G4137>fulfilled.<s%>

"But <S%G3568>now<s%> I <S%G2064>come<s%> to Thee; and <S%G3778>these<s%> <S%G3778>things<s%> I <S%G2980>speak<s%> in the <S%G2889>world,<s%> that they may <S%G2192>have<s%> My <S%G5479>joy<s%> <S%G4137>made<s%> <S%G4137>full<s%> in <S%G1438>themselves.<s%>

"I have <S%G1325>given<s%> them Thy <S%G3056>word;<s%> and the <S%G2889>world<s%> has <S%G3404>hated<s%> them, <S%G3754>because<s%> they are not of the <S%G2889>world,<s%> <S%G2531>even<s%> as I <S%G1510>am<s%> not of the <S%G2889>world.<s%>
"I do not <S%G2065>ask<s%> Thee to <S%G142>take<s%> them out of the <S%G2889>world,<s%> but to <S%G5083>keep<s%> them from the <S%G4190>evil<s%> [one.]
"They are not of the <S%G2889>world,<s%> <S%G2531>even<s%> as I <S%G1510>am<s%> not of the <S%G2889>world.<s%>
<S%G37>"Sanctify<s%> them in the <S%G225>truth;<s%> Thy <S%G3056>word<s%> is <S%G225>truth.<s%>
"As Thou didst <S%G649>send<s%> Me into the <S%G2889>world,<s%> I <S%G2532>also<s%> have <S%G649>sent<s%> them into the <S%G2889>world.<s%>
"And for their <S%G5228>sakes<s%> I <S%G37>sanctify<s%> <S%G1683>Myself,<s%> that they <S%G846>themselves<s%> <S%G2532>also<s%> may be <S%G37>sanctified<s%> in <S%G225>truth.<s%>

"I do not <S%G2065>ask<s%> in <S%G4012>behalf<s%> of <S%G3778>these<s%> <S%G3441>alone,<s%> but for <S%G3588>those<s%> <S%G2532>also<s%> who <S%G4100>believe<s%> in Me <S%G1223>through<s%> their <S%G3056>word;<s%>

that they may <S%G3956>all<s%> be <S%G1520>one;<s%> <S%G2531>even<s%> as Thou, <S%G3962>Father,<s%> [art] in Me, and I in Thee, that they <S%G2532>also<s%> may be in Us; that the <S%G2889>world<s%> may <S%G4100>believe<s%> that Thou didst <S%G649>send<s%> Me.
"And the <S%G1391>glory<s%> <S%G3739>which<s%> Thou hast <S%G1325>given<s%> Me I have <S%G1325>given<s%> to them; that they may be <S%G1520>one,<s%> <S%G2531>just<s%> as We are <S%G1520>one;<s%>

I in them, and Thou in Me, that they may be <S%G5048>perfected<s%> in <S%G1520>unity,<s%> that the <S%G2889>world<s%> may <S%G1097>know<s%> that Thou didst <S%G649>send<s%> Me, and didst <S%G25>love<s%> them, <S%G2531>even<s%> as Thou didst <S%G25>love<s%> Me.

<S%G3962>"Father,<s%> I <S%G2309>desire<s%> that they <S%G2548>also,<s%> <S%G3739>whom<s%> Thou hast <S%G1325>given<s%> Me, be with Me <S%G3699>where<s%> I <S%G1510>am,<s%> in <S%G2443>order<s%> that they may <S%G2334>behold<s%> My <S%G1391>glory,<s%> <S%G3739>which<s%> Thou hast <S%G1325>given<s%> Me; for Thou didst <S%G25>love<s%> Me <S%G4253>before<s%> the <S%G2602>foundation<s%> of the <S%G2889>world.<s%>

"O <S%G1342>righteous<s%> <S%G3962>Father,<s%> <S%G2532>although<s%> the <S%G2889>world<s%> has not <S%G1097>known<s%> Thee, <S%G1161>yet<s%> I have <S%G1097>known<s%> Thee; and <S%G3778>these<s%> have <S%G1097>known<s%> that Thou didst <S%G649>send<s%> Me;

and I have <S%G1107>made<s%> Thy <S%G3686>name<s%> <S%G1107>known<s%> to them, and will <S%G1107>make<s%> it <S%G1107>known;<s%> that the <S%G26>love<s%> <S%G3739>wherewith<s%> Thou didst <S%G25>love<s%> Me may be in them, and I in them. "
